ComicInfo.Summary:
Holmes and Watson continue their search for Michael Williams, only to discover they are not the only people doing so. Are the mysterious figures trailing the detectives responsible for Michael’s disappearance? Meanwhile, Moriarty’s reappearance puts someone close to the sleuths in mortal danger!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | John Cassaday & José Villarrubia | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | John Cassaday & José Villarrubia | 2 | C/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | John Cassaday | 3 |
